name: skinned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used with adjectives to form adjectives describing the type of skin something or someone has: pale-skinned Nectarines are a smooth-skinned variety of the fuzzy peach. See
skin
More examplesFewer examplesDana was an olive-skinned beauty with long dark hair.I love cooking a big crisp-skinned turkey for a feast.Some dark-skinned women develop patches of paler skin on their face and necks.
